languages.text: "Соломон, я могу тебе как-то помочь с расследованием?"
"Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"
languages.original_text: "Соломон, я могу тебе как-то помочь с расследованием?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide to your investigation?"
"Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide to your investigation?"
"Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"
"Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"
"Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"
"Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"

languages.text: 「ソロモーン、君の調査で何か{mf|俺|私}に手伝えることはあるか？」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン、君の調査で何か{mf|俺|私}に手伝えることはあるか？」

languages.text: "Solomorne, soruşturmanda yardımcı olabileceğim herhangi bir şey var mı?"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, soruşturmanda yardımcı olabileceğim herhangi bir şey var mı?"

languages.text: «Solomorne, ¿puedo ayudar en algo a su investigación?».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne, ¿puedo ayudar en algo a su investigación?».

languages.text: “调查得怎么样了，索罗蒙？需要我提供援助吗？”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"

traits.locale_text: “调查得怎么样了，索罗蒙？需要我提供援助吗？”

languages.text: "Solomorne, kann ich Euch bei Eurer Untersuchung irgendwie helfen?"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, kann ich Euch bei Eurer Untersuchung irgendwie helfen?"

languages.text: « Solomorne, puis-je vous aider d'une quelconque manière dans cette enquête ? »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, is there any assistance I can provide in your investigation?"

traits.locale_text: « Solomorne, puis-je vous aider d'une quelconque manière dans cette enquête ? »
